name: Mommys Beauty Salon - Makeup, Dressup & Kids Games
name_original: Mommys Beauty Salon - Makeup, Dressup & Kids Games
description:
Help give mommy a new makeover at the salon simulator! Go to the spa, do lots of pretty make-up & add jewelry & accessories!

Level 1: Help the mommies get ready for their beautiful new makeovers at the salon spa!

Level 2: It's mommy make up time! Apply lipstick, powder and much more!

Level 3: Help the new mommy at the spa salon. Add star-fruit, use the exfoliation cream and much more!

Level 4: Beautiful new mommy is getting ready and needs your help to look her best!

Level 5: Time for a fun manicure! Remove nail polish, buff the nails, and have fun!

Level 6: Help fix the toe-nails with a pedicure!

Level 7: Princess mommy needs to get ready for a fun day! Go to the spa and get ready!

Level 8: Monster mommy wants to play! Give the mommy a fun makeover!

Level 9: Mommy needs a fun new makeover!! Get ready and add lots of cute new make-up and jewelry to look the best!

*Level 10: Help the characters get ready for a new makeover in the salon waiting room!

*Level 11: Apply make-up at the salon! Add powder, lipstick and more!

*Level 12: Prepare for a makeover at the spa! Add cucumbers to the eyes and clean-up!

*Level 13: Help get ready with cool new make-up and fun fashion!

*Level 14: Time for a manicure at the nail salon! Remove the old nail polish & add new paint!

*Level 15: Clean-up & give a pedicure! Apply nail polish and more!

*Level 16: Princess mommy needs your help getting ready at the spa!

*Level 17: Help mommy get ready for a beautiful wedding day!

*Level 18: It's a mommy movie star fashion makeover!! Get ready to go out with lots of glamorous make-up and fashionable accessories!

*Please note that levels 10-18 must be purchased separately.
*Please note that Mommy Beauty Simulator is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.*

Kids Games Studio is very concerned about our users' privacy. To understand our policies and obligations, please read our Terms Of Service and Privacy Policy carefully.
